author: Simon Difford
description: Rye whiskeys’ strength and spice cuts through and dries the rich sultana notes of PX sherry with the bitters, particularly the walnut bitters, adding flavour and complexity.
name: Roosevelt Cocktail #2
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
